div.div: Cornell College vs. St. Norbert College
at De Pere, Wis. | Schneider Stadium

tr.td: Cornell wins toss and defers choice. SNC will receive south end.
Kaleb Whiting kickoff 52 yards to the SNC13, Brandon Carter return 0 yards to the SNC13.
St. Norbert College drive start at 15:00.
Jack Becker pass complete to Zach Reeves for 37 yards to the 50 yardline, out-of-bounds.
Brad Boockmeier rush for 1 yard to the CC49 (Aaron Gruwell), PENALTY SNC personal foul (Jacob Bunk) 15 yards to the SNC36.
